title: Voter Turnout in Mexican Legislative Elections

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, C, D and E. Using the data in the graph, identify the year with the lowest voter turnout. Using the data in the graph, describe the relationship between total vote and voting-age population in Mexico between 1993 and 2017. Describe political participation. Using the data in the graph, draw a conclusion about political participation in legislative elections in Mexico. Explain what the data imply about why democracies encourage political participation.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, C, D and E. Using the data in the graph, identify the year with the lowest voter turnout. Using the data in the graph, describe the relationship between total vote and voting-age population in Mexico between 1993 and 2017. Describe political participation. Using the data in the graph, draw a conclusion about political participation in legislative elections in Mexico. Explain what the data imply about why democracies encourage political participation.

topic.text: 3.5: Nature and Role of Political Participation

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
